sentence.Network_en: The dermis is composed of the connective tissue that supports the epidermis.
sentence.Network_cn: 真皮是由支撑表皮的结蒂组织构成的.

sentence.Network_en: Althouth very thin, the epidermis serves to protect the underlying dermis.
sentence.Network_cn: 表皮虽然非常薄, 却可用来保护下层的真皮.
